description: Employer-Sponsored Scheme (ESS) pension data extraction schema

provider.description: Name of the pension provider or scheme administration company (Aviva, Legal & General, Standard Life, etc.)

contactNumberAndEmail.description: Contact telephone number and email address for the provider

planNumber.description: Unique plan or policy number identifier

planType.description: Type of pension plan (e.g., Group Personal Pension, SIPP, Workplace Pension)

startDate.description: Date when the pension plan started or was established (DD/MM/YYYY)

retirementDateAge.description: Planned retirement date or nominated pension age for the pension plan (Date or Number/Age)

employerName.description: Name of the employer sponsoring the scheme

currentValueDate.description: Current value of the pension plan and the date of valuation (Currency GBP & DD/MM/YYYY)

transferValueDate.description: Transfer value amount and the date of the transfer value quote (Currency GBP & DD/MM/YYYY)

deathValueIfDiff.description: Death benefit value if different from the transfer value (Currency GBP)

fundsInvestedInAndValues.description: List of individual funds, holdings or shares that the pension is invested in and their current values

currentFundValue.description: Current value of the fund (Currency GBP)

amcTer.description: Annual Management Charge (AMC) or Total Expense Ratio (TER) (Percentage)

flexiAccessDrawdown.description: Whether flexi-access drawdown is available on the plan. Flexible Income Drawdown. Income Drawdown. Drawdown. FAD. If the plan must be transferred to another scheme to get Flexible Access Drawdown benefits, then this is 'NO' (Yes/No)

ufpls.description: Whether UFPLS (Uncrystallised Funds Pension Lump Sum) is available, on a FULL encashment basis (Yes/No)

partialUfplsAvailable.description: Whether partial UFPLS withdrawals are available (Yes/No)

earlyWithdrawalChargeTransferPenaltyExit.description: Details of any transfer penalties, Early Withdrawal Charges (EWC), exit costs, exit fees, Early Claim Charge, etc. that apply (Text/Currency)

transferPenaltyEndDate.description: Date when transfer penalties will end or reduce (DD/MM/YYYY)

currentRegularsOrDatePaidUp.description: Current regular contribution amount or date when contributions were paid up. Contributions are either personally paid or employer paid (GROSS per month Â£). Regular contributions are regarded as 'Current' if the last regular payment is dated within 6 months of the date the plan information was created (Currency GBP or DD/MM/YYYY)

dateOfLastContribution.description: Date of the last contribution made to the plan (DD/MM/YYYY)

totalContributionsIn.description: Table showing total contributions made into the plan

percentOfContributionIntoEachFund.description: Table showing percentage allocation of contributions into each separate fund the client is investing in

dateRegularsArePaid.description: Date when regular contributions are paid (e.g., monthly, annually)

indexationOnRegulars.description: Details of indexation, escalation or increase applied to regular contributions (Text/Percentage)

annualReviewDayAndMonthIndexation.description: Annual review day and month for indexation increases (DD/MM)

annualRateOfIndexationIncrease.description: Annual rate of indexation increase percentage

waiverOfContribution.description: Whether waiver of contribution, WOC or Waiver of premium benefit is available (Yes/No)

monthlyCostOfWaiver.description: Monthly cost of the waiver of contribution benefit (Currency GBP)

contribution_history.description: Extract ALL contributions from inception to current date - every contribution made to this policy

transfersInOrLumpSumContributions.description: Details of transfers in or lump sum contributions made. Payments which were Transfer In Payments (Text/Table)

bulkBlockTransfer.description: Whether transfers were part of a bulk or block transfer arrangement (Yes/No)

aDayValueTfc.description: For Pensions with a Start Date before A-day, i.e. 06/04/2006, the value of the Tax Free Cash Lump Sum Entitlement as of that day for the pension. For plans that started pre A-Day, the Tax Free Cash may be 'Protected' i.e. over the standard 25% (Currency GBP)

aDayFundValue.description: For Pensions with a Start Date before A-day, i.e. 06/04/2006, the value of the Pension itself as of that day (Currency GBP)

aDayTaxFreeValue.description: The Tax Free Cash as of A-Day (Currency GBP)

enhancedTfcCheck.description: Whether the plan has 'Protected' or 'Enhanced' Tax Free Cash, i.e. Tax Free Cash entitlement of ABOVE 25% (Yes/No)

garGmpOtherGuarantees.description: Details of any Guaranteed Annuity Rate (GAR), Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP), or other guarantees, or Safeguarded Benefits (Text Multi-line)

generalGuarantee.description: General guarantee information and details for Safeguarded benefits

lifeCover.description: Details of life cover benefits attached to the pension plan

numberOfFundsAvailable.description: Total number of funds available for investment

numberOfFundManagers.description: Number of different fund managers available

maxFundsAtOneTime.description: Maximum number of funds that can be held at one time

fundSwitches.description: Details of fund switching options and any restrictions

origoOptionsCase.description: Whether the plan supports Origo Options for electronic transfers (Yes/No)

withProfits.description: Whether the plan includes with-profits investments (Yes/No)

terminalFinalBonus.description: Details of terminal or final bonus arrangements (Text/Percentage)

mva.description: MVA or sometime MVR (Market Value Reduction) is essentially a Transfer Penalty or Reduction which reduces With Profits funds on Transfer (Text/Percentage/Currency GBP)

mvaFreeDate.description: Date when MVA will no longer apply (DD/MM/YYYY)

bonusHistoryLast5Years.description: Bonus history for the last 5 years (Text/Table)

guarantees.description: Details of any guarantees (bonus rate, minimum annuity, reversionary bonus, cash sum) (Text Multi-line)

guaranteeCostCharge.description: Cost charge for any guarantees provided (Currency GBP)

paidUpProjectionsToSra.description: Projections or Illustrations of the Pension Value to the client's State Retirement Age (SRA) (65, 67 etc). For pensions that are receiving current regular contributions this will be the projection on a 'Ceased' or 'Paid Up' basis (Text/Table/Currency GBP)

regularsContinuingProjectionsToSra.description: Projections or Illustrations of the Pension Value to the client's State Retirement Age (SRA) (65, 67 etc). For pensions that are receiving current regular contributions this will be the projection on a 'Continuing' basis i.e. presuming the payments will continue to retirement age (Text/Table/Currency GBP)

projectionStartDate.description: The date the projection was created (DD/MM/YYYY)

projectionEndDate.description: The date the Projection is to, usually Selected Retirement Age (SRA) (DD/MM/YYYY)

projectionGrowthRate.description: The Growth Rate of the Projection (always select the Medium Rate), will be a percentage. Look for the Average Mid Growth Rate. If no Average Rate, then individual funds will have growth Rates (Percentage)

inflationRate.description: The Rate of Inflation presumed on the Projection (usually 2%) (Percentage)

isLifestylingApplied.description: Whether lifestyling or a lifestyle profile is applicable on the plan (Yes/No)

ifLifestylingOverallGrowthRate.description: Overall growth rate used in projections if lifestyling is applied (Percentage)

partialTransferPossible.description: Whether partial transfers are possible from the plan (Yes/No)

chargingStructureAlterIfContributionsCea.description: Whether the charging structure would change if contributions cease (Yes/No)

canClientTransferFundButStillContribute.description: Whether client can transfer fund away but continue making contributions (Yes/No)

contributionsHistoryReceived.description: Whether a contributions history has been received (Yes/No)

annualManagementCharge.description: The Annual Management Charge (AMC) percentage (%). This might be called, Annual Charge, Annual Fee, Plan Charge, it could be a charge for the pension itself or on individual funds (Percentage)

planChargePolicyFee.description: Plan charge or policy fee amount (Currency GBP)

fundFactsheetsSavedInFile.description: Whether fund factsheets have been saved in the file (Yes/No)

initialChargesPaidLast3Years.description: Initial charges paid in the last 3 years (adviser and non-adviser) (Currency GBP)

loyaltyBonus.description: Loyalty bonus percentage or amount (Percentage/Currency GBP)

chargeDiscountsRebates.description: Any charge discounts or rebates available (Text/Percentage)

exitCharge.description: Exit charge or early withdrawal penalty

fund_charges.description: Table of fund charges for each invested fund

risk_category.description: Risk category classification (e.g., Medium Risk, Lower to Medium Risk, Minimal Risk)

category_description.description: Description of the risk category and investment strategy

currentEssProvider.description: Name of the current ESS (Employer-Sponsored Scheme) provider

isSchemeADb.description: Whether the scheme is a Defined Benefit (DB) scheme (Yes/No)

memberWithinLast12Months.description: Whether the client became a member within the last 12 months (Yes/No)

availableAvcDcPlanLinked.description: Whether there is an available AVC or DC plan linked to the scheme (Yes/No)

canTfcBeCommutedFromAvcDcToPreserveDb.description: Whether TFC can be commuted from AVC/DC to preserve DB benefits (Yes/No)

schemeAcceptTransfersIn.description: Whether the scheme accepts transfers in from other pensions (Yes/No)

isClientMember.description: Whether the client is a member of the scheme (Yes/No)

qualifyingWorkplacePension.description: Whether this is a qualifying workplace pension scheme (Yes/No)

schemeTypeMoneyPurchase.description: Whether the scheme type is money purchase (DC) (Yes/No)

autoEnrolmentCompliant.description: Whether the scheme is auto-enrolment compliant (Yes/No)

yearsOfService.description: Total years of service in the scheme

activeOrDeferred.description: Whether membership is active or deferred

normalRetirementAge.description: Normal retirement age for the scheme

maxEmployerContributionsUsed.description: Whether maximum employer contributions are being used (Yes/No)

additionalMatchingAvailable.description: Whether additional matching contributions are available (Yes/No)

salarySacrificeAvailable.description: Whether salary sacrifice is available for contributions (Yes/No)

employerNiSavingPassedToClient.description: Whether employer National Insurance savings are passed to the client (Yes/No)

employerNiSavingAmount.description: Amount of employer National Insurance savings passed to client (Currency GBP)

contactName.description: Name of the contact person at the provider

callerName.description: Name of the person who made the call

dateOfCall.description: Date when the call was made (DD/MM/YYYY)

timeOfCall.description: Time when the call was made (HH:MM)

current_funds.description: List of current funds held (Note: Multiple fund entries are supported)

currentFundValue.description: Current value of the fund (Currency GBP)

amcTer.description: Annual Management Charge (AMC) or Total Expense Ratio (TER) (Percentage)

allocationAfterDiscounts.description: Allocation rate after any discounts applied (Percentage)

default_funds_if_not_member.description: Default funds if not a member (Note: Multiple default fund entries are supported)

fundName.description: Name of the default fund if not a member

charges.description: Charges applicable to the default fund (Text/Percentage)

fund_holdings.description: Current fund holdings - ONLY extract funds the client is invested in with their values

fundName.description: Name of the fund held in the policy

fundValue.description: Current value of the fund in GBP

notes.description: General notes and additional information about the scheme (Text Multi-line)

processingTimeSeconds.description: Time taken to process the document (Number)

useGpt.description: Whether GPT was used in extraction (Boolean)

guaranteedAnnuityRate.description: Guaranteed Annuity Rate (GAR) details or Yes/No

guaranteedMinimumPension.description: Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) details or Yes/No

switchingFrequency.description: How often switches can be made

defined_benefit_info.description: Defined Benefit scheme specific information (if applicable)

schemeFundingLevel.description: Funding level of the scheme (for DB schemes)

documentType.description: Type of document (e.g., Annual Statement, Transfer Quote)
